Class Camera

java.lang.Object
renderer.Camera
public class Camera extends Object
Camera producing rays through a view plane

    • constructRay

      public Ray constructRay(int Nx, int Ny, int j, int i)
      constructing a ray through a pixel
      Parameters:
      Nx - represent number of columns in the view plane
      Ny - represent number of rows in the view plane
      j - represent the index of the row in the view plane
      i - represent the index of the column in the view plane
      Returns:
      ray from the camera to pixel[i,j]

    • constructRayThroughPixel

      public Ray constructRayThroughPixel(int Nx, int Ny, int j, int i)
      construct ray through a pixel in the view plane nX and nY create the resolution
      Parameters:
      Nx - number of pixels in the width of the view plane
      Ny - number of pixels in the height of the view plane
      j - index row in the view plane
      i - index column in the view plane
      Returns:
      ray that goes through the pixel (j, i) Ray(p0, Vi,j)

    • constructRays

      public List<Ray> constructRays(int nX, int nY, int j, int i, int numOfRays)
      Creates a beam of rays into a square grid thanks to Noam Shauli
      Parameters:
      nX - Pixel length
      nY - Pixel width
      j - Position the pixel on the y-axis inside the grid
      i - Position the pixel on the x-axis inside the grid
      numOfRays - The root of the number of beams sent per pixel
      Returns:
      List of beams of rays MP 8
